thread.title: Hedge Funds, Finance Firms Pump Money Into Advertising-Driven Litigation

title: Hedge Funds, Finance Firms Pump Money Into Advertising-Driven Litigation
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
Hedge funds and private finance firms are flooding money into mass torts litigation to fund television ads and other marketing....
